title: 新开服，第二人进来就崩溃
author: a213302
txt_content:
阿里云开服，1核2G，（服务端设置内存1G-1G）买了1年，反正可以升级。用了http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-242303-11-2.html （奋斗超纯净整合，服务端插件有，Ess基础权限插件，We创世神插件）这个MCPC开服，服正常开启，没有设置任何东西（包括权限组）但是1人在游戏里可以，第二个人进游戏，瞬间2个客户端全断线。然后服务端显示2人还在游戏，再登陆登录不了（kick掉也登陆不了），重开服务端才可以登陆。


Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1
        at java.util.ArrayList.elementData(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.ArrayList.get(Unknown Source)
        at net.minecraft.server.management.ServerConfigurationManager.func_72374_b(ServerConfigurationManager.java:1279)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:970)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:417)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:796)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:660)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

        Java Version: 1.7.0_75, Oracle Corporation

        Memory: 676375840 bytes (645 MB) / 1037959168 bytes (989 MB) up to 1037959168 bytes (989 MB)
        JVM Flags: 2 total; -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M
        AABB Pool Size: 2600 (145600 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 2573 (144088 bytes; 0 MB) used
        IntCache: cache: 7, tcache: 0, allocated: 13, tallocated: 95
        FML: MCP v9.01-pre FML v7.2.116.36 Minecraft Forge 10.12.0.1029 3 mods loaded, 3 mods active
        mcp{8.09} [Minecraft Coder Pack] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available
        FML{7.2.116.36} [Forge Mod Loader] (mcpc-plus-1.7.2-R0.4-forge1029-B44.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available
        Forge{10.12.0.1029} [Minecraft Forge] (mcpc-plus-1.7.2-R0.4-forge1029-B44.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)

replies.author: weiwei1740
replies.txt_content:
这是mcpc的版本bug 换用spigot或者升级核心版本即可
解决给最佳 谢谢

replies.author: a213302
replies.txt_content:
weiwei1740 发表于 2015-8-26 23:32
这是mcpc的版本bug 换用spigot或者升级核心版本即可
解决给最佳 谢谢
换了个服务端就解决了。。。
